name: DeployVisualStudioTestAgent
description: Deploy and configure Test Agent to run tests on a set of machines
author: Microsoft Corporation

groups.name: testMachineGroupsPreview
groups.displayName: Machine Options -Deploy Test Agent using Azure Resource Group or Flat Machines

inputs.name: testMachineGroupPreview
inputs.label: Machines
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a comma separated list of machine IP addresses or FQDNs. `Eg: dbserver.fabrikam.com or 192.168.12.34` Or provide output variable of other tasks. `Eg: $(variableName)` Or provide a Machine Group Name

inputs.name: adminUserNamePreview
inputs.label: Admin Login
inputs.helpMarkDown: Administrator login for the target machines.

inputs.name: adminPasswordPreview
inputs.label: Admin Password
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Administrator password for the target machines.
It can accept variable defined in Build/Release definitions as `$(passwordVariable)`.
You may mark variable type as 'secret' to secure it.

inputs.name: winRmProtocolPreview
inputs.label: Protocol
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the protocol to use for the WinRM connection with the machine(s). Default is `HTTPS`.

inputs.name: testCertificatePreview
inputs.label: Test Certificate
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the option to skip validating the authenticity of the machine's certificate by a trusted certification authority. The parameter is required for the WinRM HTTPS protocol.

inputs.name: testMachinesPreview
inputs.label: Filter Criteria
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a list of machines like `dbserver.fabrikam.com, dbserver_int.fabrikam.com, 192.168.12.34 or tags like Role:DB;OS:Win8.1`. Returns machines with either of the tags. For Azure Resource Group provide the VM Host Name for the machine name. The default is to deploy agent on all machines represented in the Machines field.

inputs.name: testMachineGroup
inputs.label: Test Machine Group / Azure Resource Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Test Machine Group or Azure Resource Group on which tests need to be run.

inputs.name: testMachines
inputs.label: Filter Criteria
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a list of machines like `dbserver.fabrikam.com`, `dbserver_int.fabrikam.com`, `192.168.12.34` or tags like `Role:DB;OS:Win8.1`. Returns machines with either of the tags. For Azure Resource Group provide the VM Host Name for the machine name. The default is all machines in the machine group.

inputs.name: machineUserName
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username with which test agent needs to run.

inputs.name: machinePassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password for the username given above.

inputs.name: runAsProcess
inputs.label: Interactive Process
inputs.helpMarkDown: Denotes if test agent needs to run as an interactive process, needed for Coded UI Tests.

inputs.name: agentLocation
inputs.label: Test Agent Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally supply the path to vstf_testagent.exe from network or local location. If no path is provided, it will be downloaded from `http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=536423`

inputs.name: updateTestAgent
inputs.label: Update Test Agent
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally specify if test agent needs to be updated.

inputs.name: isDataCollectionOnly
inputs.label: Enable Data Collection Only
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally specify if test agent needs to be used only for datacollection and not for running tests. Typically done on application under test(AUT) machine group.
